DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this randomised open study is to examine the effect of self-management program for diabetes patients.
DOC.brief_title: Patient Education in NorthTrondelag Hospital Trust
DOC.detailed_description: The primary aim in this study is HbA1c in addition to secondary aims like quality of life and coping.
DOC.criteria: Diagnosed with ICPC2, code T89 diabetes dependent on insulin and T90 diabetes not dependent on insulin Diagnosed with ICPC2, code T89 diabetes mellitus juvenile and diabetes I Attended selfmanagement program previous 12 months
